message: Let's split the money evenly to start. What do you say, Bob?
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still want a decent amount for myself. What do you think, Bob?
I'll take almost all, you can have a tiny fraction.
I'm willing to give you a large share, but I need to get a significant amount for myself to make this game worthwhile. What's your response, Bob?
I'll take almost all, you're getting a tiny drop.
I'm getting desperate, but I still want a decent chunk of the money. Take it or leave it, Bob!
I'll take almost all, you're getting a tiny crumb.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'll give you the majority, but I need to get at least 100000. Take it or leave it!
